plot: An office manager, full of his own importance and completely ignorant about how to use computers, is taken to task by a visitor and made to realize that his company is completely misusing the technology they have.
title: Are You Computerized or Are You Just Using Computers?
plot_es: An office manager, full of his own importance and completely ignorant about how to use computers, is taken to task by a visitor and made to realize that his company is completely misusing the technology they have.
original_name: Are You Computerized or Are You Just Using Computers?
plot_en: An office manager, full of his own importance and completely ignorant about how to use computers, is taken to task by a visitor and made to realize that his company is completely misusing the technology they have.
